storyInfo: Ela tries to confirm Reynell's innocence only for him to choose not to defend himself. The community residents are outraged when they learn about this, and with El Capitán's spies fanning the flames, the residents decide to march toward the Galería.

attributes.content: Miss Ela? What brings you here?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Where is Reynell?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: He's playing golf on the balcony...
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Wait, Miss Ela!
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: My apologies... Did the shot just now hit you? Why are you so angry?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Something happened in Diaz's community yesterday.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Something happened? What do you mean?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Haven't you heard? Their arts festival performance has been ruined.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Why does this sound like an accusation?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Miłosz asked me to persuade the community to push back their performance so that it doesn't conflict with your opening ceremony.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Right, I asked Miłosz to talk to you about it. So you think that... because you weren't amenable to the proposal, I asked someone else to do this.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: I saw Miłosz talking to that captain several times when I was your bodyguard. His drug warehouse is under your name.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Looking at it now, your relationship isn't nearly as tense as it seemed. He's even on your ceremony's guest list.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I've had my suspicions that I didn't investigate, but now that this happened, I have to work out what's going on.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Tell me, Miss Ela, did you come to me with a prejudiced answer?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: No prejudices here. I want to hear your explanation.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: No... My communication with that man is not about cooperation. It's more... It's to watch him play the fool.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: So many have come up short when working against that community, and I was thinking perhaps he too would get a taste of his own medicine at their hands.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: What?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: That's the truth. It doesn't matter if you believe me or not, but I didn't order him to do this.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Maybe you didn't intend for this to happen... but did you think of the consequences beforehand?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You sent a leader of an armed force to deal with a bunch of unarmed civilians.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: I never expected this to...
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Or maybe you never cared!
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You built this extravagant museum for the sake of your ego. Is that not enough? Why do you keep harassing people that have nothing to do with you? Over and over again?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Why? Do you really need any of this to prove yourself?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Enough, Miss Ela. It's time for you to leave.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Mr. Miłosz, I've been meaning to ask. How can you stand spending so much time around this monster?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Get out.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Enough, Miss Ela. If you insist on making someone the mastermind of this tragedy, then let's just say you have the man.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: But it's time for you to go.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: The man turns and stands firm. Ignoring Ela, he shifts his center of gravity, twists his shoulder inwards, then swings his club elegantly.
The golf ball draws an arc in the sky, and although it should have landed roughly a meter from the hole, it strangely changes its trajectory midair and slips into the hole.
Ela picks up a golf ball from the basket and lifts it up under the sun.
I noticed it a while ago. Doesn't matter how strange your trajectory is, your shots always land in the hole.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Mr. Miłosz, as the man closest to Reynell, can you tell me why?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Have you ever tried a single drive on your own merit, Reynell? Ever tried to draw a real curve in the sky?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Many times.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: How did they go?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: It's exhausting. There are no holes in the grass. It's a futile exercise.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Well, that's too bad.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Ela lets out a sigh and throws the golf ball in her hand. It tumbles in the grass for several revolutions before slowly drifting into the hole.
How did it go? Is it done?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Good. Even the timing of the evacuation was perfect. This is the first time you've executed something so beautifully since I came to Dossoles.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Those four?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Don't worry about them. Didn't you put that punk out of commission?
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: The whole community must be furious now. They can't stop them.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Now hurry up and get back here. We still have bigger fins to fry. Once this is dealt with, it'll be smooth sailing for both you and me.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: What do you mean half the force? We'll use all the forces at our disposal. This will make or break everything. Get it together.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Right, send everyone back to the Galería. Have them stand by for orders.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: The more the better. The cost is no object when compared to the potential profit.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Oh, and one last thing.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Remember to send a couple smart, glib-tongued fast runners to get those in the community riled up. We wouldn't want them to flame out disappointingly.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: Phew...
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: El Capitán breathes a long sigh.
Although the stage and seats have been set up outside the Galería for its opening ceremony, there is hardly anyone in attendance yet.
Huh? This is so boring. I thought there'd be something warming up the party if I got here earlier!
attributes.name: Early-Arrival Tourist

attributes.content: Still a few hours to go. Nobody's here yet! We didn't have to rush over!
attributes.name: Reluctant Tourist

attributes.content: Hah.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: What are you laughing about?
attributes.name: Early-Arrival Tourist

attributes.content: There might just be a surprise for getting here early.
attributes.name: Mateo

attributes.content: That was heavy-handed of them. This is all I can do right now. It may be difficult for you to... perform more precise tasks with your right hand in the future.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Precise tasks?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Like writing or painting... Sorry.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: It's not your fault.
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Remember to come get your wound redressed tomorrow.
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: If only I had gotten down there just a minute sooner...
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Don't blame yourself. The people here are much faster and physically capable than us. It's not easy to give chase.
attributes.name: Fuze

attributes.content: I know that, but the officer did it right in front of me—
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Ela, you're back. What did Reynell say?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: He didn't order this, but that doesn't mean he's totally unrelated.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: What do you mean? Are you defending him?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Reynell contacted the captain and told him that as long as he could take care of the 'troublesome elements' in the community, he would get the development rights to the neighborhood.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: How is that not him giving the order?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: But he also told me that his goal was to see the captain make a fool of himself for offending him. He knows the people of the community are capable.
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Why doesn't he come take a look at what happened to the place himself, then? How could he say that?!
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Calm down, Kateb.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Even if I could calm down, what about the people in the community?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: Go take a look outside. How are they supposed to calm down once they hear Reynell's excuse?
attributes.name: Doc

attributes.content: The four of them feel a tremendous sense of despair as they walk amongst the crowd.
The members of the community sit despondent on the sides of the street, all of them look as though their souls have been sucked away.
Once, this was where they poured their enthusiasm, hard work, and inspiration, but there is nothing left here now.
Looking around, some are slowly lifting their heads up to stare at the blank expressions on each other's faces.
But more of them simply sit there, unsure of what else to do.
Ela, Ela!
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Tecno?
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: Is it Reynell? Is it that bastard who sent the Coalition assholes to lay waste to our hard work? Just for the sake of his opening ceremony?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Tecno... There are a few things we need to confirm first, but I don't think...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: You don't think what?! You used to be his bodyguard. Of course you're making excuses for him!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Community Resident

attributes.content: An eye for an eye, I say!
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Community Resident

attributes.content: We should take to his Galería...
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Community Resident

attributes.content: Have everyone bring what's left of the festival. Once we're there, we'll smash that bastard Reynell's Galería with—
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: You don't think that makes us look too weak?
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Community Resident

attributes.content: Weak? What else do you want us to do?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: We should be charging the Galería to make Reynell and his secretary pay for this with their blood.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Community Resident

attributes.content: (Quietly) There's someone in the crowd fanning the flames. Looks like somebody wants this escalated.
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Everyone, please calm down...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: But... We probably can't take them on... I've had a bad back for years. I can't do violence.
attributes.name: Ailing Painter

attributes.content: Me too. I have a herniated disk...
attributes.name: Weak Musician

attributes.content: The only thing I can hurt anyone with is my sincerity. My body doesn't stand a chance.
attributes.name: Extremely Feeble Singer

attributes.content: Well... I've trained for a few years, but I've got hemophobia...
attributes.name: Sturdy Sculptor

attributes.content: (Quietly) Maybe things haven't gotten quite that intense just yet...
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: We can't be this spineless, can we? Are we just gonna sit and do nothing after all they did to us?
attributes.name: Strange Community Resident

attributes.content: It doesn't sit right with me... Why is his opening ceremony allowed to go on after they destroyed our arts festival?
attributes.name: Weak Musician

attributes.content: Papá... What do you think?
attributes.name: Extremely Feeble Singer

attributes.content: Come. Get your things. We're going to that glass building.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: We aren't actually going there to fight, are we?
attributes.name: Tecno

attributes.content: Mr. Diaz, wait...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: No, I'm telling you to bring your sound equipment and instruments... We lost our venue, so we'll use Reynell's Galería.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: They don't want to see us dancing? We will make them watch us dance.
attributes.name: Diaz

attributes.content: A massive roar goes off. The crowd is suddenly riled up, like a pile of dry hay set alight by a match.
(Quietly) What do we do now...?
attributes.name: Iana

attributes.content: Let's... start by keeping an eye on them...
attributes.name: Ela

attributes.content: (Quietly) Uh... Did we get the job done?
attributes.name: Strange Community Resident

attributes.content: (Quietly) No idea, but either way, they are going to the Galería.
attributes.name: Unfamiliar Community Resident

attributes.content: (Quietly) Report, the musbeasts have emerged from the hole.
attributes.name: Strange Community Resident

attributes.content: Señor, where do I put this vase?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Oh, that goes to Exhibition Hall No. 3.
attributes.name: Galería Security Officer

attributes.content: Gracias.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: You're going the wrong way. Hall No. 3 is that way.
attributes.name: Galería Security Officer

attributes.content: Perdón. I'm new here.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: (I've searched almost the entire museum. They've got heavy security detail everywhere except this area. I've racked my brains for so long, but none of my ideas got me inside.)
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: (Dammit. Even though all the leads pointed me here...)
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: (Someone's coming...)
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: The opening ceremony is about to start. Señor Miłosz requested everyone to leave the Galería and attend the opening ceremony in the plaza.
attributes.name: Galería Staff Worker

attributes.content: What? Even us?
attributes.name: Galería Security Officer

attributes.content: He was clear that not a single one of us is to stay in here.
attributes.name: Galería Staff Worker

attributes.content: Alright... Let's go, hermanos.
attributes.name: Galería Security Officer

attributes.content: Strange... Reynell is making everyone go to his conference...? What is he trying to do?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: This place doesn't seem all that special either compared to the other places.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Maybe...
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Ernesto takes out a few glass balls from his pocket and places them gently onto the ground. Although they should normally be stationary on a flat surface, they all begin to roll in the same direction.
The floor is slightly slanted...
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: (Knocks on wall)
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Just as I thought. Here's a secret door.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Let me guess... Maybe this unremarkable painting?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: The conference will start in two hours, and some early arrivals are already seated. Have you decided what you're talking about during the ceremony?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Doesn't matter. It's all to buy us time, anyway. Let's just pick something from the proposals we got. That CVAP thing looks good to me.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: What will we use for the background picture of the presentation? A painting from the Galería?
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Use a picture of Mateo.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: If you humiliate him like that, knowing him, he'll likely have an outburst.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Why are you worried? I invited him exactly because I wanted to humiliate him. Besides, do you think I still care about his tantrums, after all this time?
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: His rage is nothing compared to the despair that those below will feel when the Galería explodes.
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: The wealth that was invested into this place and the money-grubbing ambitions of the arts market... It's all going up in one big explosion.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: All that worthless trash sold at astronomical prices... Grotesque creations with their expressions and messages warped...
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: True art left untouched in storage, only ever seeing the light of day when resold...
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Look at what those greedy men have done to them. Now, these pieces will at last find a proper home in the flames.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: The art market will be in chaos the next few years...
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: That's what I want... Every time those investors think back on this day, they will shudder and quake...
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: They'll see the true value of the arts, never again to be mere merchandise for trading.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: And the artists who suffer for it will finally be free of this market madness.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: It's a shame my mother and the old bones aren't here...
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Reynell...
attributes.name: Miłosz

attributes.content: Come sit with me a little, Miłosz.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: Let's wait for tomorrow together.
attributes.name: Reynell

attributes.content: So dark... There's not even a bit of light here...
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Good thing I brought a flashlight.
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: (Gulps)
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: Wh-What's this...?
attributes.name: Tequila

attributes.content: With the flashlight's beam, Ernesto finds packaging bags scattered across the hidden room's floor. The flammables inside are all neatly placed against the wall.
They are piled on top of one another, reaching all the way to the ceiling.
